description: On your desk, nightstand, or anywhere else, the Philips Fidelio DS3010 Docking Speaker delivers crystal-clear sound that fills your personal space. This compact great sounding speaker dock is portable, allowing you to keep your music with you. Synchronize your iPod or iPhone with your PC and enjoy the option of A/C or battery power for maximum flexibility. With its compact, 360-degree design, the DS3010 is gorgeous to look at from any angle. It's also packed with advanced features and includes a free app for even more options.
title: Philips Fidelio DS3010 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Speaker Dock
